member.name: T:Classes.Defining.Book
member.summary: Represents a book with title, author, published, and page count.

member.name: F:Classes.Defining.Book._published
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the book is published.

member.name: F:Classes.Defining.Book._author
member.summary: The author of the book.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Book class.
member.param: The published status of the book.
The number of pages in the book.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.GetDescription
member.summary: Gets a brief description of the book.
member.returns: A string containing the book's title and author.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.GetName
member.summary: Gets the book's name.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.setName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the book's name.
member.param: The new name for the book.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.GetAuthor
member.summary: Gets the book's author.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.setAuthor(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the book's author.
member.param: The new author for the book.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.GetPageCount
member.summary: Gets the book's page count.

member.name: M:Classes.Defining.Book.setPageCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the book's page count.
member.param: The new page count for the book.

member.summary: Gets or sets the animal's action.

member.summary: Prints the animal's action to the console.
